section.title: QCOW2
section.para: Words to introduce the feature set. http://people.gnome.org/~markmc/qcow-image-format.html

listitem.para: Smaller file size, even on filesystems which don't support holes (i.e. sparse files)
Copy-on-write support, where the image only represents changes made to an underlying disk image
Snapshot support, where the image can contain multiple snapshots of the images history
